description: Creates a new WorkSpace image from an existing WorkSpace.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the new WorkSpace image.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the new WorkSpace image.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the source WorkSpace.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to the new WorkSpace image. To add tags when you're creating the image, you must create an IAM policy that grants your IAM user permission to use workspaces:CreateTags. (dict) --- Describes a tag. The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the new WorkSpace image.

nested_items.name: OperatingSystem
nested_items.description: The operating system that the image is running.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The availability status of the image.

nested_items.name: RequiredTenancy
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the image is running on dedicated hardware. When Bring Your Own License (BYOL) is enabled, this value is set to DEDICATED. For more information, see Bring Your Own Windows Desktop Images..

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: The date when the image was created.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the image.
